text:
@NYGovCuomo I'm advised not to work because of #coronavirus, Im jobless.

No income but the bills keep coming. Any savings are dwindling. 

If debt cannot be suspended and is still owed after... Im sure there will be plenty of homelessness to add. 

How do I choose between FOOD and BILLS?
